page.title: 02HILL FARM.
page.content: {The Farm is owned by the Reeds.} Barry and Shirley own 360 acres of which 167 are winter wheat,87 grass,50 winter barley,20 are peas and 36 acres are woodland.They own a total of 102 cows of which 52 are milkers and 50 heifers.Each dairy gives 3800 litres of milk per year.They sell milk to the public for 22p per. pt and 18.341p to the milk board.They also own 50-60 pigs.The cows are going to be sold for slaughter because the E.E.C.will not pay extra money for extra milk.The cows are producing too much milk and farmers are losing money.They own a combine harvester, four tractors,four trailers ,1 reversable plough,a combine drill,2 different harrows,1 grass topper and a dung spreader.Also at the farm are a couple of grain bins.
